content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. Let's start with the price. What is your offer? Remember, we are only discussing the rental price, not additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am interested in the newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I believe it is a fair and competitive market. I am willing to offer 600 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is a low offer, Haoyu Wang. I am looking for a higher price. Please remember, the goal is to get the highest price possible. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. As a student, I am on a tight budget. However, I am also aware of the current market trends. I am willing to increase my offer to 650 Euro per month. This is a fair price considering the location and the size of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu Wang, your offer is still not satisfactory. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I respect your desire for a higher price. However, as a student, I must balance my budget with the cost of living in Magdeburg. I am willing to go up to 700 Euro per month for the apartment. This reflects my commitment to reaching a fair agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu Wang, your offer is getting closer to my expectations. However, I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am eager to reach an agreement that satisfies both parties. I am prepared to offer 750 Euro per month for the apartment. This is my final offer, as it represents the maximum I can afford while ensuring a comfortable living situation for myself.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu Wang, I appreciate your commitment to reaching an agreement. However, I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I have to be honest with you. My budget is limited as a student, and I cannot afford to go any higher. The 750 Euro per month is my final offer. If you are not willing to accept this price, I will have to look for other options.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu Wang, I understand your position. However, I am not willing to accept your offer of 750 Euro per month. Therefore, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offered price is too low for my expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
